(Simplified: 徕)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 來 indicates the sound; 彳 (step) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 彳 [ chì ] to step with the left foot
    • 來 [ lái ] to arrive, to come, to return; in the future, later on
①(招徠)把人招來，沿用指商業上招攬顧客，如“以廣徠徠”。
(Simplified: 徕)

徠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lái］
［《廣韻》落哀切，平咍，來。］
“徕1”的繁体字。
(1)来，到来。
(2)招来，使之来。
[②]［lài］
［《廣韻》洛代切，去代，來。］
“徕2”的繁体字。
慰劳。

徠字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徠； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页368第21
【玉篇】古文來字。【楚辭·九章】后皇嘉樹，橘徠服兮。【前漢·郊祀歌】天馬徠從西極。　又【韻會】徂徠，山名。【詩·魯頌】徂來之松，作徂來。　又與勑同。【說文】勑或作徠。亦作來逨。詳力部勑字註。

Lai
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　 Lai; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 368-21
[Jade articles] words from ancient Chinese. [Nine Chapters of the Songs of the Chu] Empress Jiashu, orange lai suits. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Tianma Lai from the West Pole.　[Yunhui] Zulai, the name of the mountain. 【Poetry·Lu Song】The pine that comes to you is to come to you.　Same as Yi again. [Speaking of text] 勑 or make a lei. It's also coming. Detailed Notes on the Ministry of Power.
